tools.name: UpdateDraftEmail
tools.description:
Update an existing draft email in Outlook.

This tool overwrites the subject and body of a draft email (if provided),
and modifies its recipient lists by selectively adding or removing email addresses.

This tool can update any un-sent email:
    - draft
    - reply-draft
    - reply-all draft
    - forward draft

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the draft email to update

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The new subject of the draft email. If provided, the existing subject will be overwritten

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new body of the draft email. If provided, the existing body will be overwritten

parameters.name: to_add
parameters.description: Email addresses to add as 'To' recipients.

parameters.name: to_remove
parameters.description: Email addresses to remove from the current 'To' recipients.

parameters.name: cc_add
parameters.description: Email addresses to add as 'CC' recipients.

parameters.name: cc_remove
parameters.description: Email addresses to remove from the current 'CC' recipients.

parameters.name: bcc_add
parameters.description: Email addresses to add as 'BCC' recipients.

parameters.name: bcc_remove
parameters.description: Email addresses to remove from the current 'BCC' recipients.

output.description: A dictionary containing the updated email details

summary:
**Outlook Mail Toolkit Overview**
The Arcade.dev Outlook Mail toolkit provides powerful functionalities to integrate Outlook Mail capabilities into applications. It enables developers to manage email interactions seamlessly through a variety of tools and features.

**Capabilities**
- Create, send, and draft emails with ease.
- List and filter emails across all mailbox folders.
- Reply to emails and manage draft updates effectively.
- Retrieve comprehensive user profile and configuration details.

**OAuth**
- **Provider**: Microsoft
- **Scopes**: Mail.Read, Mail.ReadWrite, Mail.Send, User.Read

**Secrets**
No secrets are required for usage.
